dublinCore.title: 113 SRES 2 ATS: Informing the House of Representatives that a quorum of the Senate is assembled.
dublinCore.rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

form.current-chamber: IN THE SENATE OF THE UNITED STATES

action.action-desc: Mr. Reid (for himself and Mr. McConnell) submitted the following resolution; which was considered and agreed to

form.official-title: Informing the House of Representatives that a quorum of the Senate is assembled.

section.text: That the Secretary inform the House of Representatives that a quorum of the Senate is assembled and that the Senate is ready to proceed to business.
